rottapeli.resource

Class Language

  • java.lang.Object
    • rottapeli.resource.Language

  • public class Language
extends Object
    Language manager. Contains a map of words and phrases of a specified language that will be inserted instead of a generic language. Specific language shouldn't contain character '%' as a part of its translation.
    Author:
    Pavel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Language(RottaPeli peli)
      Constructor.

      Maps a translation from generic to a specific language based on a line of String fetched from the language file.

        Constructor. Loads the words.

    • Method Detail

      • chooseLanguage

        public void chooseLanguage()
        Shows a file chooser window and lets the user choose another language file.

      • chooseLanguage

        public void chooseLanguage(File file)
        Retranslates everything in the program from a specified language file.
        Parameters:
        file - Language to which everything should be translated to.

      • retrieveWords

        public boolean retrieveWords(File language)
        Loads all words and phrases of a specific language.
        Parameters:
        language - File from which words will be retrieved.
        Returns:
        true if words were retrieved.

      • isValidLanguageFile

        public boolean isValidLanguageFile(Scanner sc)
        Checks if language file is valid. File is valid if it has appropriate String in the first line. Note that after calling this method sc.nextLine() shouldn't be called as this method does that already.
        Parameters:
        sc - Scanner object that scans the language file.
        Returns:
        true if language file is usable.

      • mapWord

        public void mapWord(String wordPair)
        Maps a translation from generic to a specific language based on a line of String fetched from the language file.
        Parameters:
        wordPair - A Line of String that contains a translation.

      • translate

        public String translate(String word)
        Translates a word of generic language into a specific language.
        Parameters:
        word - Word in a generic language, starts with '#'
        Returns:
        User-friendly word of some specific language.
